City Council
------------

**Kittitas City Council**

  

**Schedule:** City Council meetings are generally held the second an fourth Tuesdays of every month starting at 6:00pm. Special meetings and study sessions are scheduled as needed. The public is invited to attend these meetings. Transcripts of City Council meetings may be found [here](https://www.towncloud.io/go/kittitas-wa/).

  

**Location:** Council Chambers, Kittitas City Hall - 207 North Main Street

  

|  |  |  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| **Council Members** |  |  |  | **Term Expires** |
| Position 1 | Sean Crabb |  |  | 2025 |
| Position 2 | Hannah Woodiwiss |  |  | 2025 |
| Position 3 | Jerry Lael |  |  | 2027 |
| Position 4 | Tyrul McGuffin |  |  | 2027 |
| Position 5 | Joe Scoleri |  |  | 2027 |
